comments:
If you quickly type text into this field, it will likely result in the "infinite loop of text" problem that has been seen elsewhere.  This occurs in both orm.xml and java.  

Selecting another node will generally break out of the loop, upon which the following exception is thrown.

Created an attachment (id=69538)
proposed patch

Fixed this issue in 2 other locations.  The sequence and table generator panels both had this problem as well.

This is an ugly UI issue that we have solved in most places and have a proven, consistent fix for.  We are simply applying this fix to the remaining places where this is a problem.  Low-risk, tested, and approved.
This has been tested and verified (Discriminator Value combo, sequence, table generator...)
